title: Background Color Generator
description: A web app that generates random background colors and allows users to copy the color code and use it in their projects.
details: This project was built to demonstrate my front-end development skills... It features a user-friendly interface that allows users to generate random background colors and copy the color code for use in their projects.

title: Weather Web App
description: A weather web app that allows users to search for weather information by location and get real-time weather data.
details: This project was built to demonstrate my front-end development skills... It features a user-friendly interface that allows users to search for weather information by location.

title: SafeKey.exe
description: A password analyzer desktop application that allows users to generate strong passwords, check password strength, and copy their passwords.
details: SafeKey.exe is a password analyzer desktop application that allows users to generate strong passwords, check password strength, and manage their passwords securely. It features a user-friendly interface that allows users to generate random passwords, check password strength, and copy their passwords.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A fully responsive e-commerce website with cart functionality and payment integration.
details: This project was built to demonstrate my full-stack development skills...
